body_html: Same for me @toxato . I am running Pycharm on a remote interpreter (in a remote virtual-env). It seems it does not save the paths. As @chamwen says, this can be solved. However, Pycharm will recognize /usr/local/cuda/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH as the path in your local computer, not remotely. Any ideas how can we set up that path in such a way that Pycharm will recognize this as a remote path?
